activities: Teneo Media, LLC is a digital marketing firm specializing in web/mobile/software application development, engagement and e-Commerce strategies.  In addition to our consulting-based client service work, we offer Software as a Service for website frameworks and content management systems.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
Private sector dispute resolution mechanism incorporating Safe Harbor Framework.

Dispute Resolution (from Teneo Media's Privacy Policy)

Prior to undertaking any arbitration or litigation, the parties shall make reasonable efforts to resolve disputes informally, including by means of a conference between the executives of each party who have authority to resolve the dispute.  In the event any dispute in any way related to this Agreement arises between the parties, and parties cannot resolve any such dispute via arbitration in North Carolina pursuant to the JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and Procedures in effect at the time a demand for arbitration is made.
